title: How to stop being embarrassed by condescending, arrogant elitist snobs, and spot them coming
description: Clips from @paulvanderklay, @theanadromist, @chrispetkau , talking about the negative (and sometimes positive) effect of arrogance, snobbery, and elitist modes of communication, regardless of the subject.
